i1.blurb: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Jarvan IV's''' [[basic attack]]s deal {{as|8% of target's '''current''' health}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}, with a minimum of 20 damage and capped at 400 damage against non-champions.
This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
i1.name: Martial Cadence
notes: * The triggering attack will apply other {{tip|on-hit}} effects and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal, as well as apply {{sti|life steal}}.
** The bonus damage will not do any of these and neither will it affect structures.
* ''Martial Cadence'' will not be applied if the attack is {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, or if it {{tip|blind|misses}}.

q1.blurb: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' extends his lance in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies and {{sti|armor penetration|{{as|reducing their armor}}}} for 3 seconds.
If the lance connects with a deployed {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}}, '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|dashes}} to it, {{tip|airborne|knocking up}} nearby enemies along his path for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|80 to 240}} {{as|(+ 120% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|10 to 26}}% of target's armor}}}}
q1.name: Dragon Strike
notes: * ''Dragon Strike's'' damage will not benefit from its own armor reduction.
* ''Dragon Strike'' will still pull ''Jarvan IV'' to his {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}} if he is immobilized but he will remain as such when he reaches his destination (duration permitting).

w1.blurb: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|slow|slows}} all nearby enemies for 2 seconds.
'''Jarvan IV''' also {{tip|shields}} himself for 5 seconds, increased by {{as|{{fd|1.5}}% of '''Jarvan IV's''' '''maximum''' health}} for each enemy champion hit by ''Golden Aegis''.
w1.name: Golden Aegis
notes: * ''Golden Aegis'' has no cast time and will not interrupt ''Jarvan IV's'' previous orders.

e1.blurb: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jarvan IV''' gains permanent {{sti|attack speed|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' throws a ''Demacian flag'' to the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all nearby enemies.
The flag then remains for 8 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} around it and providing an [[aura]] that grants ''Demacian Standard's'' {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}} to all nearby allied champions.
e1.name: Demacian Standard
notes: * The bonus attack speed from ''Demacian Standard's'' aura will apply to ''Jarvan IV'' and stack with its passive's.
* ''Demacian Standard'' can be targeted by allied minion-targetable abilities ({{si|Teleport}}, {{ai|Safeguard|Lee Sin}}).
* Even though the ''Demacian Standard'' has a finite amount of health it is both untargetable to enemy basic attacks as well as immune to area-of-effect damage.
** This makes it effectively invincible and indestructible.

r1.blurb: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jarvan IV''' {{tip|dash|leaps}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to an enemy champion and deals {{as|physical damage}} to all nearby enemies upon arrival.
Upon impact, he creates a circle of impassable terrain for {{fd|3.5}} seconds that grants {{tip|sight}} around it. '''Jarvan IV''' can reactivate ''Cataclysm'' to destroy the circle.
r1.name: Cataclysm
notes: * ''Cataclysm'' will not deal damage, generate terrain, or refund its cooldown if ''Jarvan IV'' is killed mid-leap.
* ''Cataclysm'' does not track targets who transit out of their location.
* {{cai|Searing Charge|Ornn}} will not destroy the whole ring but only the part that {{ci|Ornn}} collides to.
